remarks: The set of lattice planes in a Hilbert lattice.  (Contributed by NM, 16-Jun-2012.)
statement:
lplnset.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
lplnset.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
lplnset.n $e |- N = ( LLines ` K ) $.
lplnset.p $e |- P = ( LPlanes ` K ) $.
lplnset $p |- ( K e. A -> P = { x e. B | E. y e. N y C x } ) $.
$d B x $.
$d K x y $.
$d N y $.
